title: lol client version 6.1.16_01_20_13_46 rejected by server
body:
Having this issue, any way to fix it that doesn't involve using up my mobile data on another 1 gig download? I've already had to do the delete Air client fix twice this month :/ 

I would be very grateful for any help

Thanks

replies.body:
Hey guys,

Can you try [forcing a re-patch](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#wq5) and let me know if you have the same issue?

Mindstar
Deleting C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_launcher and re-patching worked for me

> [{quoted}](name=Cough Lolly,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=9hveUThI,comment-id=00040001,timestamp=2016-01-28T12:06:18.591+0000)
>
> Deleting C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_launcher and re-patching worked for me

how re-patch lol ?
u click on the questionmark on the upper right corner of the patcher and click repair

it works??? for you
how long does it take

????
pls tell me
it took the same amount of time as a regular patch.

no
 {{champion:238}}
yeah this worked thanks :)
yes, just click on the questionmark on the upper right corner of the patcher and click repair!!
It worked amazingly! Thank you so much :)
i had the exact same issue. I uninstalled league and deleted the riot games folder (necessary). Then I reinstalled the game and now it works again.

Hi,

League was updated to 6.2 this morning - did you not receive the patch when you started up League today?

Cheers
Mindstar
https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=942363242523505&set=a.115954581831046.22867.100002495135279&type=3&theater
my client downloaded the files, but when i start the login screen itÂ´s still set to 6.1.16_01_20_13_46 on the top left corner
Having the same error after updating the patch this morning as well
SO I tried to run the repair and now im getting errors saying the repair wont work
Client version 6.21.16_10_13_19_54 is rejected by server.
hey some 1 help me >_< i cant login in {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
I managed to get mine to work after running repair in compatibility mode for win 7 (I'm using 10)
Patch fix worked for me :) thank you

i have same problem . i have win 7

I'm having the same issue...
hi same issue here. i did try that forcing a re-patch but still didnt work. now im trying to repair. hope it'll work. im still waiting. please let me know how to fix this. thank you.

The same thing happened to me.
 I played last night, had the patch this afternoon and once I tried to play again, I had the same login error.

yeah i'm having this same issue!
i just got back from a holiday and want to just relax and play some league. i updated it and whatnot but now it won't let me log in.
